++ Future Change Accommodation

FCA is a technique from TheDevelopmentModusOperandi that encourages [Architecture]s, [Applications] and TheSystem itself to be designed so that changes can be made in the future. This is to prevent [SubsequentChangeSensitivity]

++Examples
Adding fields to already created systems can be complicated since there is unspecified behaviour for old systems that do not read the new fields. 
    * HTTP protocol -  HTTP is very simple and easy to add new fields
    * [Email]
